faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Demos

q1.question: How long does a demo typically last?
q1.answer: Our demos typically last 30-45 minutes, but we can adjust the length based on your needs and questions.

q2.question: Do I need to prepare anything for the demo?
q2.answer: No preparation is required. However, if you have specific questions or scenarios you'd like us to address, feel free to mention them when scheduling the demo.

q3.question: Can I invite colleagues to join the demo?
q3.answer: Absolutely! We encourage you to invite anyone from your team who would be involved in using the platform or making the purchasing decision.

q4.question: Is there a cost for the demo?
q4.answer: No, our demos are completely free of charge and come with no obligation to purchase.
